DOC.brief_summary: Funded Ohio Department Job Family Services - Medicaid Technical Assistance Policy Program ( MEDTAPP ) , `` Child Health Excellence Center - University-Practice-Public Partnership '' ( CHEC-UPPP ) focus improve health Ohio 's child 3 target area : 1 ) prevention dental decay ; 2 ) detection management overweight obesity ; 3 ) lead screen . These topic represent critical public health issue Ohio 's child . DOC.brief_title: QI Study Practice Facilitator 's Impact Working With Clinics Improving Dental , Lead & Obesity Measures Children
DOC.detailed_description: The research design involve sample 30 primary care practice ( combination pediatric family medicine ) across Northeast Ohio least 20 % Medicaid patient population . We use cross-over study design . After run-in period baseline data collect via chart review practice receive basic education 3 focal area lead , dental obesity screening , practice randomly assign one two group . The Phase 1 group receive practice-tailored intervention Practice Facilitator ( PF ) start immediately randomization continue 6 month . The Phase 2 group start practice-tailored intervention PF 4 month post-randomization continue post-randomization month 10 . This design give u natural 'control ' group ( Phase 2 group ) first four month post-randomization . The Phase 2 group Run-in Phase education Phase 1 group , start practice-tailored intervention study facilitator 4 month , time cross-over Intervention Phase . Both Phase 1 Phase 2 group 2 month Follow-up Phase completion 6 month Intervention Phase . During Follow-up Phase strive continue reach outcome measure without support PF . This give u opportunity ass short-term sustainability rate delivery service achieve Intervention Phase .
